abstract.shortdesc: Creates a new VPC NAT gateway.

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock: euca-create-nat-gateway [-s SUBNETID] [-a ALLOCATIONID] [--show-empty-fields] [-U URL] [--region USER@REGION] [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--security-token TOKEN] [--debug] [--debugger] [--version] [-h]

row.entry: The subnet in which to create the NAT gateway.
The allocation ID of an Elastic IP address to associate with the NAT gateway.

section.title: Output
section.p: If an output was requested, then Eucalyptus returns a message stating that the NAT gateway was successfully created.
